<<<<<<< HEAD
A proclamation, discharging the levying or transporting of souldiers vvithout licence Scotland. Privy Council. Gibson, Alexander, Sir, d. 1693. Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed by Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most excellent Majesty, Edinburgh : 1675.
Caption title. Royal arms at head of text; initial letter. Intentional blank spaces in text. Dated at end: Given under Our Signet, at Edinburgh the tenth day of June, one thousand six hundred and seventy five years, and of Our Reign the twentieth and sixth year. Signed: Al. Gibson Cl. Sti. Concilii. Imperfect: stained with some loss of text. Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
=======

Dated at end: Given under Our Signet, at Edinburgh the tenth day of June, one thousand six hundred and seventy five years, and of Our Reign the twentieth and sixth year. Signed: Al. Gibson Cl. Sti. Concilii. Imperfect: stained with some loss of text. Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.

Andrew Anderson
